name: 管懿丽
introduction: Tina has participated in a couple of award-winning film projects with multiple roles.In WMF's latest feature film, Black Whirlwind, she was the producer and director of BW’s BTS documentary. She’s also a marketer who has employed a blend of tools and channels alongside digital, social media, and other available routes to promote films. She has an excellent understanding of Chinese digital marketing and years of experience in content marketing.
